article.title: Big Ass Article
article.description: we 'bout to get hella poontang if you know what i mean yo. rollin in the pussy like dusi the poon-slayer. cuz dats what its really all about in da end. makin bank and slaying poon, ya feel?
article.author: BOB fucking DYLAN
